dot.description: Whether it is displayed as a small red dot

max.description: Maximum, exceeding the maximum value will show '{max}+', valid only if content is a number
max.description_zh: 最大值，超过最大值会显示 `{max}+`，仅当 content 为数字时有效

:offset.description: Sets the offset of the logo, the two items of the array correspond to the offset horizontally to the right and vertically downward, respectively, and the default unit is px
:offset.description_zh: 设置徽标的偏移量，数组的两项分别对应水平向右和垂直向下方向的偏移量，默认单位为 px

show-zero.description: Whether or not to display the logo when the content is the number 0 or the string '0'
show-zero.description_zh: 当 content 为数字 0 或字符串 '0' 时，是否展示徽标

slots.name: default
slots.description: A child element wrapped in a logo
